Metadata.title: IMGPrompt - AI Painting Intelligent Prompt Generator | Supports Stable Diffusion/Midjourney/DALL·E/FLUX
Metadata.description: IMGPrompt is a professional AI painting prompt generation tool compatible with Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL·E, and FLUX. It supports multi-language intelligent translation and creative recommendation systems, offering visual vocabulary management, preset style parameters, and lighting effect templates to help creators quickly achieve creative visualization. Through intelligent semantic association and color randomization tools, it sparks creative inspiration and optimizes generation effects.
Metadata.keywords: IMGPrompt, Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL·E, FLUX, Image prompt generation, Visual creativity tool, prompt, AI, prompt recommendation, translate prompt, image prompt

ToolPage.hierarchyTip: Operation sequence: Select Subject → Refine Category → Add Tags

ResultSection.tooltip-light: Apply portrait lighting template (including film lighting, twilight rays, and others)
ResultSection.tooltip-polish: Load image optimization parameters (resolution enhancement/artistic style enhancement)
ResultSection.insertSuccess: Optimization parameters have been added to the prompt
ResultSection.tooltip-negative: Copy common negative prompts (to avoid common flaws)
ResultSection.tooltip-translate: Enter text in any language to translate into English
ResultSection.translateSuccess: Translation successful and added to the prompt

CopyToClipboard.empty: Content is empty, nothing to copy
CopyToClipboard.unsupported: Your browser does not support clipboard operations, please try copying manually or use a different browser
CopyToClipboard.success: Copied successfully, you can paste it into the AI painting tool

feedback.feedback2: If you encounter any issues during use or have any suggestions and ideas, feel free to let me know! Your feedback will directly influence the development and improvement of future features, helping us create a tool that better meets everyone's needs.
feedback.feedback3: Please describe your use case or the issue you encountered in detail, or share your creative ideas. I will carefully consider each piece of feedback and make adjustments and optimizations as soon as possible.
feedback.placeholder: Please leave a message, no login required (enter your email to receive reply notifications)
